greenAbilityOptions.name: Ambush Awareness
greenAbilityOptions.text: If you haven’t yet acted in an action scene, you may Defend against an Attack by rolling your single [power] die.

greenAbilityOptions.name: Change in Circumstance
greenAbilityOptions.text: When you change personal zones, you may Boost by rolling your single [power] die.

greenAbilityOptions.name: Immunity
greenAbilityOptions.text: You do not take damage from [energy/element].

yellowAbilityOptions.name: Area Alteration
yellowAbilityOptions.text: [Boost or Hinder] any number of nearby targets using [power]. Use your Max die.

yellowAbilityOptions.name: Inflict
yellowAbilityOptions.text: Attack using [power]. Hinder that same target using your Min die.

yellowAbilityOptions.name: Reflexive Burst
yellowAbilityOptions.text: When your personal zone changes, Attack all close enemy targets by rolling your single [power] die.

yellowAbilityOptions.name: Always Be Prepared
yellowAbilityOptions.text: Boost yourself using [power]. That bonus is persistent and exclusive. Then, Attack using your Min die. You may use the bonus you just created on that Attack.

yellowAbilityOptions.name: Reactive Field
yellowAbilityOptions.text: When you are attacked by a nearby enemy, the attacker also takes an equal amount of damage.

yellowAbilityOptions.name: Flowing Fight
yellowAbilityOptions.text: Attack using [power]. Use your Mid die to Attack one extra target for each bonus you have. Apply a different bonus to each Attack.

yellowAbilityOptions.name: Danger Sense
yellowAbilityOptions.text: When damaged by an environment target or a surprise Attack, Defend by rolling your single [power] die.

yellowAbilityOptions.name: Adaptive
yellowAbilityOptions.text: Boost yourself using [power], then either remove a penalty on yourself or Recover using your Min die.

yellowAbilityOptions.name: Area Assault
yellowAbilityOptions.text: Attack multiple targets using [power], using your Min die against each.

greenAbilityOptions.name: Growth
greenAbilityOptions.text: Boost yourself using [quality]. That bonus is persistent and exclusive.

greenAbilityOptions.name: Rally
greenAbilityOptions.text: Attack using [quality]. Other nearby heroes in the Yellow or Red zone Recover equal to your Min die.

yellowAbilityOptions.name: Personal Upgrade
yellowAbilityOptions.text: Boost yourself using [power]. Use your Max die. That bonus is persistent and exclusive.

yellowAbilityOptions.name: Misdirection
yellowAbilityOptions.text: When a nearby hero in the Yellow or Red zone would take damage, Defend against that damage by rolling your single [power] die, then redirect any remaining damage to a nearby minion of your choice.

yellowAbilityOptions.name: Throw Minion
yellowAbilityOptions.text: Attack a minion using [power] The result of the minion’s save Attacks another target of your choice.

greenAbilityOptions.name: Overpower
greenAbilityOptions.text: Whenever you are Boosted, increase that bonus by +1. Then, if that bonus is +5 or higher, take damage equal to that bonus and remove it.

greenAbilityOptions.name: Unflagging
greenAbilityOptions.text: At the start of your turn, remove a penalty on yourself

yellowAbilityOptions.name: Modification Wave
yellowAbilityOptions.text: Boost or Hinder using [power], and apply that mod against multiple nearby targets.

yellowAbilityOptions.name: Mystic Redirection
yellowAbilityOptions.text: When another hero in the Yellow or Red zone would take damage, you may redirect it to yourself and Defend against it by rolling your single [power] die.

yellowAbilityOptions.name: Sever Link
yellowAbilityOptions.text: Overcome an environmental challenge using [power]. Use your Max die. Either remove any penalty in the scene or Boost equal to your Mid die.

yellowAbilityOptions.name: Call to the Wild
yellowAbilityOptions.text: Gain a d8 minion. It takes its turn before yours, but goes away at the end of the scene. You may only have one such minion at a time.

yellowAbilityOptions.name: Predator’s Eye
yellowAbilityOptions.text: Attack using [power]. Using your Max+Min dice. Then gain a Boost using your Mid die. The target of the Attack gains a Boost of the same size

yellowAbilityOptions.name: Throw Minion
yellowAbilityOptions.text: When you defeat a minion, roll that minion’s die and Boost yourself using that roll to create a bonus for your next action.

greenAbilityOptions.name: Grasping Vines
greenAbilityOptions.text: Hinder using [power]. Use your Max die. You may split that penalty across multiple nearby targets.

greenAbilityOptions.name: Natural Weapon
greenAbilityOptions.text: Attack using [power]. Use your Max die.

yellowAbilityOptions.name: Harvest Life Force
yellowAbilityOptions.text: Attack using [power]. Use your Min die. Take damage equal to your Mid die, and one nearby ally Recovers Health equal to your Max die.

yellowAbilityOptions.name: Magical Shield
yellowAbilityOptions.text: When another hero in the Yellow or Red zone would take damage, you may Defend them by rolling your single [power] die.

yellowAbilityOptions.name: Momentary Power
yellowAbilityOptions.text: Boost yourself using [power]. Use your Max die. Hinder a nearby opponent with your Min die.

yellowAbilityOptions.name: Relic Drain
yellowAbilityOptions.text: Hinder using [power]. Also Recover Health equal to your Min die.

greenAbilityOptions.name: Draw Power
greenAbilityOptions.text: Boost yourself using [power]. That bonus is persistent and exclusive.

greenAbilityOptions.name: Punishment
greenAbilityOptions.text: Whenever you Attack an enemy that has inflicted a penalty on you, treat that penalty as if it were a bonus for the purpose of that Attack.

yellowAbilityOptions.name: Energy Converter
yellowAbilityOptions.text: When you take damage from [element/energy], gain a bonus equal to that amount of damage.

yellowAbilityOptions.name: Explosive Attack
yellowAbilityOptions.text: Attack up to three different targets using [power]. Apply your Max die to one, your Mid die to another, and your Min die to the third. If you roll doubles, take a minor twist or take irreducible damage equal to that die.

yellowAbilityOptions.name: Onboard Upgrade
yellowAbilityOptions.text: Boost yourself using Power Suit. Use your Min+Mid dice. That bonus is persistent and exclusive.

greenAbilityOptions.name: Damage Reduction
greenAbilityOptions.text: Reduce [physical or energy] damage you take by 1 while you are in the Green zone, 2 while in the Yellow zone, and 3 while in the Red zone.

greenAbilityOptions.name: Diagnostic Subroutine
greenAbilityOptions.text: Whenever your status changes due to a change in your current Health, you may remove a penalty on yourself.

yellowAbilityOptions.name: Radioactive Recharge
yellowAbilityOptions.text: Boost yourself using [power]. Then, either remove a penalty on yourself or recover using your Min die.

yellowAbilityOptions.name: Unstable Reaction
yellowAbilityOptions.text: After rolling during your turn, you may take 1 irreducible damage to reroll your entire dice pool.

yellowAbilityOptions.name: Wither
yellowAbilityOptions.text: Attack using [power]. Hinder that target using your Max die.

greenAbilityOptions.name: Charged Up
greenAbilityOptions.text: Whenever you roll a 1 on one or more dice, you may reroll those dice. You must accept the result of the reroll.

greenAbilityOptions.name: Dangerous Lash
greenAbilityOptions.text: Attack multiple targets using [power], applying your Min die to each. If you roll doubles, also attack an ally using your Mid die.

greenAbilityOptions.name: Radioactive Aura
greenAbilityOptions.text: When a new target enters the scene close to you, you may Attack it by rolling your single [power] die.

yellowAbilityOptions.name: Energy Burst
yellowAbilityOptions.text: Attack multiple targets using [power], using your Min die against each.

yellowAbilityOptions.name: Recharge
yellowAbilityOptions.text: Boost yourself using [power]. Then, either remove a penalty on yourself or Recover using your Min die.

yellowAbilityOptions.name: Techno-Absorb
yellowAbilityOptions.text: If you would take damage from [element/energy you have a related power for], instead reduce that damage to 0 and Recover that amount of Health instead.

yellowAbilityOptions.name: Tactical Analysis
yellowAbilityOptions.text: When Attacked, treat the amount of damage you take as a Boost action for yourself.

greenAbilityOptions.name: Indiscriminate Fabrication
greenAbilityOptions.text: Boost using [power], assigning your Min, Mid, and Max dice to 3 different bonuses, one of which must be given to an enemy.

greenAbilityOptions.name: Organi-Hack
greenAbilityOptions.text: Attack a target using [power]. Hinder that target with your Min die

yellowAbilityOptions.name: Area Healing
yellowAbilityOptions.text: Boost an ally using [power]. You and nearby heroes in the Yellow and Red zones Recover Health equal to your Min die.

yellowAbilityOptions.name: Recharge
yellowAbilityOptions.text: Boost or Hinder using [power], and apply that mod to multiple close targets.

yellowAbilityOptions.name: Personal Upgrade
yellowAbilityOptions.text: Boost yourself using [power]. Use your Max die. That bonus is persistent and exclusive.

yellowAbilityOptions.name: Reach through Veil
yellowAbilityOptions.text: When a nearby ally would take damage, Defend that ally by rolling your single status die, and move them elsewhere in the same scene.

yellowAbilityOptions.name: Created Immunity
yellowAbilityOptions.text: When you would take damage from [element/energy], you may Recover that amount of Health instead.

yellowAbilityOptions.name: Multiple Assault
yellowAbilityOptions.text: Attack using [power] against multiple targets, using your Min die against each.

yellowAbilityOptions.name: Recalulating...
yellowAbilityOptions.text: After rolling during your turn, you may take 1 irreducible damage to reroll your entire dice pool.

greenAbilityOptions.name: Created Form
greenAbilityOptions.text: Reduce physical damage to yourself by 1 while you are in the Green zone, 2 while in the Yellow zone, and 3 while in the Red zone.

greenAbilityOptions.name: Intentionality
greenAbilityOptions.text: Whenever you roll a 1 on one or more dice, you may reroll those dice. You must accept the result of the reroll.

yellowAbilityOptions.name: Attunement
yellowAbilityOptions.text: When you would take damage from [element/energy], you may Recover that amount of Health instead.

yellowAbilityOptions.name: Costly Strength
yellowAbilityOptions.text: Boost all nearby allies using [power]. Use your Max+Mid dice. Hinder yourself with your Min die.

yellowAbilityOptions.name: Cursed Resolve
yellowAbilityOptions.text: Boost yourself using [power]. Then, either remove a penalty on yourself or Recover using your Min die.

greenAbilityOptions.name: Double Edged Luck
greenAbilityOptions.text: Whenever you roll a 1 on one or more dice, you may reroll those dice. You must accept the result of the reroll.

greenAbilityOptions.name: Extremes
greenAbilityOptions.text: Whenever you roll a die’s max value, treat that value as 1 higher. When you roll a 1 on a die, treat that die as if it had rolled a 0.

yellowAbilityOptions.name: Alien Boost
yellowAbilityOptions.text: Boost all nearby allies using [power]. Use your Max+Mid dice. Hinder yourself with your Min die.

yellowAbilityOptions.name: Empower and Repair
yellowAbilityOptions.text: Boost, Hinder, Defend, or Attack using [power]. You and all nearby heroes in the Yellow or Red zone Recover Health equal to your Min die.

yellowAbilityOptions.name: Halt
yellowAbilityOptions.text: When you are Attacked at close range, Defend yourself by rolling your single [power] die.

yellowAbilityOptions.name: A Plan For Everything
yellowAbilityOptions.text: When you are attacked, first roll your single [power] die. Defend yourself with that roll. Then, Boost yourself using that roll.

yellowAbilityOptions.name: Expanded Mind
yellowAbilityOptions.text: Boost yourself using [power]. Use your Max die. That bonus is persistent and exclusive. Then Attack using your Min die.

yellowAbilityOptions.name: Overwhelming Vision
yellowAbilityOptions.text: Attack using [power]. Then, if the target of the Attack survived, also Attack that target with your Max die. Otherwise, Recover an amount of Health equal to your Min die.

yellowAbilityOptions.name: Cosmic Ray Absorption
yellowAbilityOptions.text: If you would take damage from [element/energy you have a related power for], instead reduce that damage to 0 and Recover that amount of Health instead.

yellowAbilityOptions.name: Encourage
yellowAbilityOptions.text: Attack using [power]. Boost all nearby heroes taking Attack or Overcome actions using your Min die until your next turn.

yellowAbilityOptions.name: Mass Adjust
yellowAbilityOptions.text: Boost or Hinder using [power] and apply that mod against multiple close targets.

yellowAbilityOptions.name: Absorb Essence
yellowAbilityOptions.text: When you defeat a minion, roll that minion’s die and Boost yourself using that roll.

yellowAbilityOptions.name: Aura of Pain
yellowAbilityOptions.text: Attack multiple targets using [power]. Then, take irreducible damage equal to the number of targets hit.

yellowAbilityOptions.name: Bizarre Strike
yellowAbilityOptions.text: Attack using [power]. Use your Max die. Hinder that target with your Mid die. Hinder yourself with your Min die.

greenAbilityOptions.name: Attune
greenAbilityOptions.text: Boost yourself using [power]. That bonus is persistent and exclusive. Damage dealt using that bonus is all [energy/element].

greenAbilityOptions.name: Extrasensory Awareness
greenAbilityOptions.text: When you would take damage that would change your zone, Defend against that damage by rolling your single [quality] die.

yellowAbilityOptions.name: Brainstorm
yellowAbilityOptions.text: Attack using [power]. Hit one target using your Min die, another target with your Mid die, and Boost using your Max die.

yellowAbilityOptions.name: Strange Enhancement
yellowAbilityOptions.text: Boost all nearby allies using [power] using your Max+Mid dice. Hinder yourself with your Min die.

yellowAbilityOptions.name: Volatile Creations
yellowAbilityOptions.text: When one of your bonuses, penalties, or other creation of your powers is destroyed, deal a target damage equal to the roll of your [power] die.

yellowAbilityOptions.name: Command Power
yellowAbilityOptions.text: When you take damage from [elemental/energy], you may deal that much damage to another target.

yellowAbilityOptions.name: Dangerous Explosion
yellowAbilityOptions.text: Attack multiple targets using [power]. Use your Mid die. Hinder all targets damaged by this ability with your Min die. Hinder yourself with your Max die.

yellowAbilityOptions.name: Embolden
yellowAbilityOptions.text: Attack using [power], and Boost all nearby heroes taking [choose two basic actions] using your Min die until your next turn.

yellowAbilityOptions.name: Resolve
yellowAbilityOptions.text: Boost yourself using [power], then remove a penalty on yourself or Recover using your Min die.

greenAbilityOptions.name: Resilience
greenAbilityOptions.text: At the start of your turn, remove any -1 penalties on you.

greenAbilityOptions.name: Twist Reality
greenAbilityOptions.text: After rolling during your turn, you may take 1 damage to reroll your entire dice pool.

yellowAbilityOptions.name: Power From Beyond
yellowAbilityOptions.text: Boost yourself using [power]. Use your Max die. That bonus is persistent and exclusive. Then, Attack using your Min die.

yellowAbilityOptions.name: Respond In Kind
yellowAbilityOptions.text: When you are hit with an Attack at close range, the attacker also takes damage equal to their effect die.

yellowAbilityOptions.name: Dread Pallor
yellowAbilityOptions.text: Hinder multiple targets using [power]. Use your Mid die for one and your Min die for the rest.

yellowAbilityOptions.name: Reality Scorned
yellowAbilityOptions.text: Attack using [power]. If your target survived, Hinder them using your Max die.
